title: End of school
text: Graduated from high school with a high score, and in the same year, I enthusiastically enrolled in the university's faculty of information technologies to delve deeper into the world of technology. Simultaneously, I embarked on a journey of self-teaching, utilizing the wealth of available resources on the internet to explore and refine my skills as a web developer.

title: Start of Web-Developer carrier
text: As my passion for web development grew, I began to approach it with greater dedication and commitment. I delved into numerous specialized courses such as the 'Epam Learning Program' to further refine and enhance my skills. Additionally, I actively engaged in beginner-level web developer contests, seizing every opportunity to test my abilities, learn from experiences, and fine-tune my craft.

title: Present time
text: Every day, I persistently work on self-improvement, acquiring new skills necessary to reach the ideal I've envisioned for years as a web developer. It's a continuous journey toward honing expertise and achieving that long-held vision.
